data.title: Perfect family night!
data.text: Hockey games are best seen live!  The arena is clean, great food and beer options, not a bad seat anywhere!!!  Easy parking and lots of good restaurants to celebrate after the Tips win!!!

data.title: Fast action sports
data.text: Watching these young men and the level of play they are at is as good as it gets. these kids are great and they appreciate your turning out to see them play.

data.title: Really fun!
data.text: These are hockey players that are in their teens and early twenties.  The Silvertips are not a farm team for any pro team as they are too young.  The games are great family events and hockey is always exciting to watch.  Who knows we may be watching a future Sidney Crosby.  Ample parking on street.

data.title: Exciting, and fun for all ages!
data.text: I took a group of foreign exchange students and we had a wonderful time.  Any seat in the house is good, the hockey is fun to watch, and the staff are extremely kind and helpful.  It was my first time attending, and I can't wait to go back!  :) It was such a great evening!

data.title: And you can avoid going to Seattle
data.text: Minor league hockey is played with heart and hope by a band of 16-19 year olds focused on possibly moving on up to the NHL.  The action is swift and sometimes firey.  The crowds get "in" to the play enthusiastically and the atmosphere is generally fun and affordable.  I was pleasantly surprised to see hockey be received so well when it game to Everett 10+ years ago.  The Tips and the whole skating complex and event center sure beats the strip joints and faded splendor joints and shops that occupied Broadway and Hewitt when we first moved here.

data.title: Great for the Family
data.text: We have been to the Tips games many times and always enjoy it.  They do a good job of making it fun for the whole family.

data.title: Great view fun for the whole family
data.text: Went to the hockey match and had a great time. Great beer and food selection ! We even won! Find parking on side streets the parking garage was a nightmare to get out of.

data.title: Hockey
data.text: I go to games every now and then just to say I go. Not into Hockey like when I was younger. It is good to see the kids play.

data.title: FUN OUTING!
data.text: We ALWAYS have a great time when we go to a Silvertips game!  If you have never been then this is a must do!  Action packed, low cost, close to home!

data.title: Fun
data.text: Very fun to go watch the kids play.  There not as big as the pros, but there are more fights.  It can get very load inside the arena so some people bring earplugs.

data.title: We are hockey people!
data.text: We have been going for the past 3-4 years now and are buying the   6 game package. This season we ended up somehow with 8 games. We have club seats, we love going, we ring our cowbells to show support and have a blast.

data.title: Great Game!
data.text: We were part of a US Thanksgiving Hockey Tournament which included hockey tickets to a Silvertips game!  What a great game and a great win by the Silvertips!  Who says hockey is a Canadian game?  The arena was close to a sell out and the crowd was amazing at this cozy arena

data.title: Plenty of excitement!!
data.text:
It seems odd that after 10 years, this is the first review for the Everett Silvertips. It is probably safe to say that we have been to over 250 games  during that time. As far as sports go, its one of the most active games. Watching these 16-20 year old play hockey for over 70 games per season and most still going to school speaks for their character. 

I would suggest everyone go to at least one game. It most likely won't be your last. The one suggestion is bring or buy earplugs. The noise of the crowd, the music and worse of all the train horn they blow when they score a goal will make your ears ring by the end of the night.
